code: import{months}from'../../constans/months';export var formateDate=function formateDate(date){var arr=date.split('-');var num=arr[2][0]==='0'?arr[2][1]:arr[2];var month=months.find(function(el){return el.num===String(arr[1])&&el.month;});return num+' '+month.month;};export var formateNum=function formateNum(num){return Math.ceil(num)==='-0'?'0':Math.ceil(num);};export var formateNumToFixed=function formateNumToFixed(num){return num.toFixed(1).replace('.',',');};
